column5: You are renting a private room on waterfront property. You have a queen room, but no TV in your bedroom. The common area has a TV. State Hotel tax will be added by airbnb starting May 1, 2017 and Local taxes are included in this price. The shared property has a pier over the water. You have access to a fishing pier and can easily walk a few blocks to the golf course. We love meeting new people from all over the place and love sharing our home with you.
column8: Crash-boat Camp Bayside Queen Bed is waterfront
